references.reason: This paper lays the theoretical foundation for diffusion models, introducing the core concepts and techniques used in many subsequent works.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of the design space of diffusion models, influencing various aspects of model architecture and training strategies.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a highly influential latent diffusion model, impacting the field with its ability to generate high-quality images at a fast pace.

references.paper_title: Progressive distillation for fast sampling of diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents progressive distillation, a key method for accelerating diffusion model sampling, which is directly compared to and improved upon in the current work.
This paper introduces consistency models, another important method for accelerating sampling, providing another strong baseline for the current work's comparisons and improvements.
